name: 500 Flex Icons (Open Source)
description:
About Streamline

For 12 years, Streamline has made the largest, most consistent icon sets on the internet. Many of the world's best designers like Tobias Van Schneider, Khoi Vinh, recommend Streamline. We also have a web app and a figma plugin to streamline your workflow.


Flex is a minimalistic icon set, with elegant and smooth curves. These icons are super easy to adapt to your project since they have only two colors.

The Flex Free set is open-source and you can use these for free for all personal and commercial projects. ðŸŽ‰


Flex Pro is available!


Categories:

  1. Computer Devices icons > Battery, Chips, Computer, Connection, Controller, Database, Keyboard, Logo, Mouse, Printer, Robot, Screens, Smartwatch, Storage, Voicemail, and Webcam icons.
  2. Entertainment icons > Camera, Control Buttons, Leisure, Music Notes, Party, Playlist, Recording, Speakers, and Volume Control icons.
  3. Food and Drink icons > Drinks, Food, and Kitchenware icons.
  4. Health and Medical icons
  5. Images and Photography icons > Accessories, Flash, Photos, and Pictures icons
  6. Interface Essential icons > Add, Remove, Delete, Alerts, Align, Arrows, Bookmark Favorite, Calendar, Content, Cursor, Dashboard, Edit, Files Folder, Help, Hierarchy, Home, ID, Lighting, Link Unlink, Lock Unlock, Login Logout, Page Controller, Presentation, Search, Security, Settings, Share, Signal, Text Formatting, Time, Trophy Award, Upload Download, Users, Validation, and Weather icons.
  7. Mail icons > Chat Bubble, Inbox, Send, Signs, Smiley icons.
  8. Map and Travel icons > Airport, Hotel, Map, Places, Transportation, and Wayfinder icons.
  9. Finance and Shopping icons > ATM, Bags, Bank, Building Store, Business, Cart, Cash, Cashier, Categories, Cloth Accessories, Currency, Furniture, Gift Present, Graphs, Jewelry, Legal, Safe, and Wallet icons.
  10. Nature and Ecology icons > Nature and Science icons.
  11. Phone icons > Contact, Mobile Phone, and Mode icons.
  12. Programming icons > Applications, Browser, Bugs, Clouds, Modules, RSS, Script, and Web icons.
  13. Religion icons > Symbols
  14. Shipping icons > Box and Transfer icons



Try out our Figma plugin to drag and drop these icons directly in Figma. It's 100% free!

We also have a premium icon set for this style with 1,400+ icons. When you upgrade, you get access to our entire library instantly. ðŸ˜‰
